statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE last_login > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE last_login IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE last_login BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM user_data;
SELECT username, email FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_data ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_data WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT message_text, sent_at FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1 ORDER BY sent_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT username, email FROM user_data WHERE user_id > 20 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_messages FROM messages GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT sender_id, recipient_id, MAX(sent_at) AS latest_message_time FROM messages GROUP BY sender_id, recipient_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email, jsonb_array_length(friend_list) AS num_friends FROM user_data ORDER BY num_friends DESC, username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, friend_id, friend_status FROM friend_lists WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 3 AND receiver_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%a%';
SELECT user_id, password FROM users WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM friend_lists WHERE friend_status = 'pending' ORDER BY friends_id DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM User WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM User WHERE email LIKE 'john.doe%';
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT notification_text, created_at FROM Notifications WHERE user_id = 5 AND created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT u.username, f.friend_id FROM User u JOIN Friends f ON u.user_id = f.user_id WHERE u.user_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM User WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM Messages WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, friend_id FROM Friends WHERE user_id = 2 AND friend_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Notifications WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY user_id, created_at;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(notification_id) AS notification_count FROM Notifications GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(notification_id) > 5 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_user_id = 5 AND receiver_user_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM messages GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 50;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE birth_date >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 12345 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT u.username, f.friend_id, m.message_text FROM users u JOIN friends f ON u.user_id = f.user_id JOIN messages m ON u.user_id = m.sender_user_id WHERE u.username LIKE '%Doe%' ORDER BY f.friend_id DESC;
